LanguageData.BAW_Saori.label: Arius assault rifle
LanguageData.BAW_Saori.description:
Assault rifle used by Saori.

Customized by Saori in pursuit of efficiency. 

Once the prey is in sight, it never misses its shots until the target is brought down.
LanguageData.BAW_Saori.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Saori.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Saori.label: Bullet for Arius assault rifle
LanguageData.BAW_Atsuko.label: Scorpius
LanguageData.BAW_Atsuko.description: A submachine gun used by Atsuko.\n\nIt has a heavy firepower for its short barrel, and is especially suited for close quarters combat.
LanguageData.BAW_Atsuko.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Atsuko.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Atsuko.label: Bullet for Scorpius
LanguageData.BAW_Hiyori.label: Identity
LanguageData.BAW_Hiyori.description: Sniper rifle used by Hiyori.\n\nThe 20mm bullets strike true, asserting their presence on the gunfire-filled battlefield.
LanguageData.BAW_Hiyori.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Hiyori.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Hiyori.label: Bullet of Identity
LanguageData.BAW_Misaki.label: Saint Predator
LanguageData.BAW_Misaki.description: Rocket launcher used by Misaki.\n\nAfter firing, when it reaches a certain altitude, it separates into multiple munitions and causes a widespread explosion.
LanguageData.BAW_Misaki.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Misaki.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Misaki.label: SmallRocket
